document_data.mainbody:
Create crossroads and backroad was a spell used by druids.
When cast, this spell created two crossroads and a backroad to connect them. For the spell to be cast successfully, the caster had to have visited the end locations at the end of each crossroad. Additionally, the spell summoned a crossroad guardian. During casting, the spell required the casters full attention and dedication for a day.
In addition to verbal and somatic components, the spell required a divine focus.
